SummaryFileEditor Object
==========================

**Summary**
~~~~~~~~~~~

A class that handles 'get'-ing and 'write'-ing of summary files. It is built on top of the SummaryFile() class.

**Current Status**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The SummaryFileEditor object is fully operational.

**Future Work**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

There is no future work planned at this moment.

**Known Bugs**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

There are no known bugs.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Source Code**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. module:: PyStrahl.core.editor

.. autoclass:: SummaryFileEditor
    :members:
